thread.title: Mr David Machin
thread.title_full: Defender Bird Spikes reviewed by Mr David Machin

author: Mr David Machin
title: Mr David Machin
text: Ordered and received the next day my box of Bird Spikes, fixing silicone, installation dvd and paperwork. All now installed on the roof of my static caravan in the areas which appealed to the seagulls last year. It took my sons less than 3 hours to fit them and they do work perfectly, I stayed for three days to observe the gulls in action, they were not pleased, but I was. Well worth the money and the time spent doing the job, I will recommend these Bird Spikes to other owners.
